doc.field: E f0242 reute r f BC-MARSHALL-STEEL-DETAIL 02-26 0049
MARSHALL STEEL DETAILS GAIN FROM UNIT SALE

(Marshall Steel Ltd), formerly Marshall Drummond McCall Inc, said it will report a 17 mln dlr net gain before taxes this year from the sale of its Drummond McCall division, which was sold effective January one.
Reuter
